articles.title: Nickel Asia net income soars in H1 - Philstar.com
articles.description: Listed Nickel Asia Corp. reported a 579 percent jump in its net income in the first half, driven by higher ore sales prices and volume.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — Listed Nickel Asia Corp. reported a 579 percent jump in its net income in the first half, driven by higher ore sales prices and volume.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: AirAsia nets RM240mil from Fly Leasing-Carlyle Aviation merger - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (Bernama) -- AirAsia Group Bhd (AAGB) has gained gross proceeds of US$56.83mil (RM240mil) from the merger between Fly Leasing Ltd and Carlyle Aviation Partners.
